title: thread 'rustc' panicked at 'index out of bounds: the len is 0 but the index is 0'

labels.name: I-ICE
labels.description: Issue: The compiler panicked, giving an Internal Compilation Error (ICE) ❄️

labels.name: T-compiler
labels.description: Relevant to the compiler team, which will review and decide on the PR/issue.

body:
### Code ```Rust ``` ### Meta `rustc --version --verbose`: ``` rustc 1.63.0 (4b91a6ea7 2022-08-08) ``` ### Error output ``` thread 'rustc' panicked at 'index out of bounds: the len is 0 but the index is 0', /Users/runner/.cargo/registry/src/github.com-1ecc6299db9ec823/ena-0.14.0/src/snapshot_vec.rs:199:10 ```
Backtrace
